prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or hexagonal crystalline appendages like sacred geometry horns incorporating hexagonal, dodecahedron, vesica_piscis patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and Flower of Life emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor TOCARZI's profile: 'He of such equality', Aethyr TAN, Air element, Tarot Justice, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Libra, embodying the essence: 'In TOCARZI's presence, all things regain their equilibrium an invisible scale seems to bring every s...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth
visual_elements.hair_style: hexagonal crystalline appendages like sacred geometry horns

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He of such equality'
profile_data.essence: In TOCARZI's presence, all things regain their equilibrium an invisible scale seems to bring every situation into fair and perfect balance.
profile_data.angelic_role: Power of Scales of Mercy; commands empyrean spirits.
profile_data.form_description: A living geometric construct of translucent quartz-like substance, representing the precise balance of Justice, with edges that shift between razor-sharp clarity and fluid mercurial transformation
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silver represents Air element's mercurial nature, Mercury's fluid intelligence, and Libra's balanced scales; white symbolizes purity of judgment and spiritual clarity
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagon represents perfect geometric harmony, dodecahedron connects to divine ordering of universe, Vesica Piscis symbolizes generative balance between polarities
